TopicTitle: Simple video showing the type of ships I'm working on and my first mun landing

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5VfM3EMYBR8&feature=share&list=UUnXtfA_WlNC2Iv3HXibxbMg



Not saying I'm any good at videos, but I hope you enjoy it! Just something quick I put together.

Not bad, that's a cool ship. But you were burning down??

Also, your intro is 8-10 times how long it should be. But you did a good job of only showing the important bits after that

Not sure what ya mean by "burning down" but I couldn't record the launch. The number of parts on it causes major lag. That video of the large ship moving was recorded at 10 frames per second and sped up in the editor, so I could only getting it when turning, which I didn't do much of til I got to the Mun. As for the landing, I was burning the engines on my way down just not enough I guess. I'll keep the tip in mind though. Thanks =)
He means that you don't de-orbit by burning down, you burn RETROGRADE
Awesome! How did your computer not explode with that mothership egg? Also, YOU SENT A MOTHERSHIP FOR YOUR FIRST MUN LANDING! Wow, can't wait to see what's next!
ty for clarifying that, I just thought it was simpler even if it was wrong lol

ty for clarifying that, I just thought it was simpler even if it was wrong lol

weird posting glitch
